ayahs.textUthmani: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: الٓر ۚ [Alif Laam Ra] تِلْكَ [These] ءَايَـٰتُ [(are) the Verses] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [(of) the Book] وَقُرْءَانٍۢ [and Quran] مُّبِينٍۢ [clear]

ayahs.textUthmani: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: رُّبَمَا [Perhaps] يَوَدُّ [will wish] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] لَوْ [if] كَانُوا۟ [they had been] مُسْلِمِينَ [Muslims]
ayahs.transliteration: Rubama yawaddu allatheenakafaroo law kanoo muslimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوا۟ وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَيُلْهِهِمُ ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ذَرْهُمْ [Leave them] يَأْكُلُوا۟ [(to) eat] وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ [and enjoy] وَيُلْهِهِمُ [and diverted them] ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ [the hope] فَسَوْفَ [then soon] يَعْلَمُونَ [they will come to know]
ayahs.transliteration: Tharhum ya/kuloo wayatamattaAAoowayulhihimu al-amalu fasawfa yaAAlamoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَآ [And not] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] مِن [any] قَرْيَةٍ [town] إِلَّا [but] وَلَهَا [(there was) for it] كِتَابٌۭ [a decree] مَّعْلُومٌۭ [known]
ayahs.transliteration: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illawalaha kitabun maAAloom

ayahs.textUthmani: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَّا [Not] تَسْبِقُ [(can) advance] مِنْ [any] أُمَّةٍ [nation] أَجَلَهَا [its term] وَمَا [and not] يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ [(can) delay it]
ayahs.transliteration: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they say] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O you] ٱلَّذِى [(to) whom] نُزِّلَ [has been sent down] عَلَيْهِ [[on him]] ٱلذِّكْرُ [the Reminder] إِنَّكَ [indeed, you] لَمَجْنُونٌۭ [(are) surely mad]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqaloo ya ayyuha allatheenuzzila AAalayhi aththikru innaka lamajnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَّوْ [Why] مَا [not] تَأْتِينَا [you bring to us] بِٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ [the Angels] إِن [if] كُنتَ [you are] مِنَ [of] ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ [the truthful]
ayahs.transliteration: Law ma ta/teena bilmala-ikatiin kunta mina assadiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ إِذًا مُّنظَرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَا [Not] نُنَزِّلُ [We send down] ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ [the Angels] إِلَّا [except] بِٱلْحَقِّ [with the truth] وَمَا [and not] كَانُوٓا۟ [they would be] إِذًۭا [then] مُّنظَرِينَ [given respite]
ayahs.transliteration: Ma nunazzilu almala-ikata illabilhaqqi wama kanoo ithan munthareen

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [We] نَزَّلْنَا [have sent down] ٱلذِّكْرَ [the Reminder] وَإِنَّا [and indeed, We] لَهُۥ [of it] لَحَـٰفِظُونَ [(are) surely Guardians]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalna aththikrawa-inna lahu lahafithoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] أَرْسَلْنَا [We (had) sent] مِن [before you] قَبْلِكَ [before you] فِى [in] شِيَعِ [the sects] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna min qablika feeshiyaAAi al-awwaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يَأْتِيهِم [came to them] مِّن [any] رَّسُولٍ [Messenger] إِلَّا [but] كَانُوا۟ [they did] بِهِۦ [at him] يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ [mock]
ayahs.transliteration: Wama ya/teehim min rasoolin illakanoo bihi yastahzi-oon

ayahs.wordByWord: كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] نَسْلُكُهُۥ [We let it enter] فِى [in] قُلُوبِ [(the) hearts] ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ [(of) the criminals]

ayahs.textUthmani: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَا [Not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [they believe] بِهِۦ ۖ [in it] وَقَدْ [and verily] خَلَتْ [have passed] سُنَّةُ [the way(s)] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
ayahs.transliteration: La yu/minoona bihi waqad khalatsunnatu al-awwaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِيهِ يَعْرُجُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَوْ [And (even) if] فَتَحْنَا [We opened] عَلَيْهِم [to them] بَابًۭا [a gate] مِّنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heaven] فَظَلُّوا۟ [and they were to continue] فِيهِ [therein] يَعْرُجُونَ [(to) ascend]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaw fatahna AAalayhim babanmina assama-i fathalloo feehiyaAArujoon

ayahs.textUthmani: لَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُورُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَقَالُوٓا۟ [They would surely say] إِنَّمَا [Only] سُكِّرَتْ [have been dazzled] أَبْصَـٰرُنَا [our eyes] بَلْ [Nay] نَحْنُ [we] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] مَّسْحُورُونَ [bewitched]
ayahs.transliteration: Laqaloo innama sukkirat absarunabal nahnu qawmun mashooroon
